attributes.action: Change the law on mental health after traumatic birth.
attributes.additional_details: We the people of Great Britain need the government to make mental health services more accessible so people can get the help they need after a traumatic birth. Don’t let another family suffer because the nhs is stretched. I didn’t get the care or help I needed because the nhs was too busy and rushed. I nearly lost my life. Don’t let this happen to anyone else, don’t let another women go through this. It could be worse next time.
attributes.background: Everyday women are suffering with mental health because of a traumatic birth and it’s not recognised, it affects there everyday life, it’s stop them doing things they once enjoyed. Millions are suffering everyday.

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear what you've been through.

Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. and we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
